Uses of Package
com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config

  • Packages that use com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config 
    Package Description
    com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra  
    com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config  
    com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.util  
  • Classes in com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config used by com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra 
    Class and Description
    ExecutableConfig
    An Embedded Cassandra executable config.
  • Classes in com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config used by com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config 
    Class and Description
    Config
    Configuration properties for Cassandra.
    Config.ClientEncryptionOptions
    Client-to-node encryption protects data in flight from client machines to a database cluster using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer).
    Config.CommitFailurePolicy
    Policy for commit disk failures.
    Config.CommitLogSync
    Policy for commit log sync.
    Config.DiskAccessMode
    Disk access mode policy.
    Config.DiskFailurePolicy
    Policy for data disk failures.
    Config.DiskOptimizationStrategy
    The strategy for optimizing disk read.
    Config.InternodeCompression
    Compression controls whether traffic between nodes is compressed.
    Config.InternodeEncryption
    Policy for internode encryption.
    Config.MemtableAllocationType
    Specify the way Cassandra allocates and manages memtable memory.
    Config.ParameterizedClass
    Simple Holder for complex properties.
    Config.RequestSchedulerId
    Policy for request scheduler id.
    Config.RequestSchedulerOptions
    Request Scheduler options.
    Config.ServerEncryptionOptions
    Node-to-node encryption protects data transferred between nodes in a cluster, including gossip communications, using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer).
    Config.TransparentDataEncryptionOptions
    Enables encryption of data at rest (on-disk).
    ExecutableConfig
    An Embedded Cassandra executable config.
    ExecutableConfigBuilder
    Simple builder for building ExecutableConfig.
    Version
    List of the cassandra versions.
  • Classes in com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config used by com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.util 
    Class and Description
    Config
    Configuration properties for Cassandra.
